org.tagaprice.client.gwt.shared.rpc.productmanagement
Interface IProductService

All Superinterfaces:
com.google.gwt.user.client.rpc.RemoteService
All Known Implementing Classes:
ProductServiceImpl, ProductServiceImpl
@RemoteServiceRelativePath(value="productservice")
public interface IProductService
extends com.google.gwt.user.client.rpc.RemoteService

Method Detail

getProduct

IProduct getProduct(IRevisionId revionsId)
Get a unique product from the server

Parameters:
revionsId - The ID (and Revision) of the IProduct you want to find. The ID in IRevisionId must not be null.
Returns:
The IProduct corresponding to the IRevisionId

getProducts

java.util.ArrayList<IProduct> getProducts(IProduct searchCriteria)
Depending on the search criterias returns the method a list with IProducts

Parameters:
searchCriteria -
Returns:

saveProduct

IProduct saveProduct(IProduct product)
                     throws UserNotLoggedInException
CREATE or UPDATE a IProduct on the server. CREATE: A product with id=0 or RevisionID=null gets a new id and the initial revisionID 1. UPDATE: the existing product gets a new revisionID incremented by one. Throws an exception, if the given revisionID is not the last one for this product.

Parameters:
product - The IProduct you want to UPDATE/CREATE
Returns:
the SAVED or UPDATED IProduct
Throws:
UserNotLoggedInException
